item.description:
What better reason to get the gang together than laughter? The How Men Think(Or Do They?)
Comedy Tour debuts in Portsmouth,NH at the 3rd Floor Club at the Portsmouth Gaslight Company just after the holidays on Saturday January 15th .

Doors open at 7:00 pm and the Show starts at 7:30 PM

We hope all the folks from the Portsmouth Cocktail Competition and our newest members will join us in a fun filled night of comedy.

Want to hang out after the show? No problem , the 3rd Floor club turns into a dance club after the show and admission is FREE to the comedy show audience.

We will send you a seperate link to purchase tickets! RSVP Today!
item.name: How Men Think(Or Do They?) Comedy Tour
